Erik Mikhaylovich Galimov (; 29 July 1936 – 24 November 2020) was a Russian geochemist and Doctor of Sciences. He was born in Vladivostok, Soviet Union.
He was Editor-in-Chief of the Russian journal "Geochemistry" from 2005 until his death. He was also academician of the Russian Academy of Sciences from 1994 until his death. He was a Distinguished Professor at the Lomonosov Moscow State University.
Galimov died on 24 November 2020, aged 84.
